parameters.name: CurrentPage
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. Default value: **1**.

parameters.name: EndTimeQuery
parameters.description: The timestamp when the root task ends. Unit: milliseconds.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. Default value: **20**.

parameters.name: RootTaskId
parameters.description:
The ID of the root task.

> You must specify at least one of the **TaskType** and **RootTaskId** parameters.

parameters.name: StartTimeQuery
parameters.description: The timestamp when the root task starts. Unit: milliseconds.

parameters.name: TaskType
parameters.description:
The type of the task. Valid values:

*   **CLIENT\_PROBLEM_CHECK**: a task of the Security Center agent
*   **CLIENT\_DEV_OPS**: an O\&M task of Cloud Assistant
*   **ASSET\_SECURITY_CHECK**: a task of asset information collection

> You must specify at least one of the **TaskType** and **RootTaskId** parameters.
